alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Buchanan County through 745 PM CDT... At 716 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Tripoli to near Fairbank. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fairbank around 720 PM CDT. Hazleton around 725 PM CDT. Stanley around 730 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
